title: Morde mains be like "Morde has no utility!!!!"
body:
When he heals x2 more than Soraka

hahahaha but ok

replies.body: 12 second heal that requires you to expend your best dps ability and be near an enemy champ to get it. Hardly utility.

how the fuck does it matter?

https://i.gyazo.com/61a08387f3613e53ad5a20fa8b0455c1.png
https://i.gyazo.com/19a1ac87b3d39be4cbdc1a08581ffa50.png
this is malicious metal playing
are you able to see?
it doesn't matter what are the conditions, in any games Mordekaiser ends up having the biggest amount of healing done

> it doesn't matter what are the conditions, in any games Mordekaiser ends up having the biggest amount of healing done

b-but.... jax had the most healing done......
Jax is also the jungler, and junglers get a significant boost to their healing done stat just by farming due to their jungle items.

> [{quoted}](name=JJB53,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tLjXzwxz,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2018-09-24T22:59:04.400+0000)
>
> b-but.... jax had the most healing done......

lol yeah i thought that too XD but {{champion:24}} is also the most broken champ in the game right now, followed closely by {{champion:39}} then {{champion:223}} (obviously he is broken for a reason other than damage)

well no  thats not why he is broken but, he is still broken XD

> https://i.gyazo.com/19a1ac87b3d39be4cbdc1a08581ffa50.png
> this is malicious metal playing
> are you able to see?
> it doesn't matter what are the conditions, in any games Mordekaiser ends up having the biggest amount of healing done

Yes, he heals a lot during the course of the game. But In a team fight his healing on his allies is no where near Soraka's level. Don't even try to act like it is. A good chunk of his healing comes from his ult(does a fuckton of damage and drains for 100% of damage dealt) if you would read his abilities, not to mention he could have taken vamp runes. 

This thread is a meme. Good night.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
You were 9/1 and soraka didn't even finish a single healpower item lmao
The only heal in his kid starts at a 12 second cd and ends up at 8 second cd. Soraka's w gets down to a 2 second cd without cdr.
{{item:3123}} {{item:3165}} its almost like healing on any champ that isnt mundo is a joke due to these 2 items

I just went against a morde and lost because he was too tanky to burst and sustained too hard to widdle

and yes I built grevious wounds
Stop revealing my secret medikaiser jungle strats!
We post alot of threads on the Boards. I'm starting to think you don't read anything we say
